SELECT BOARDID , BOARDTYPE , BOARDSEQUENCE , TITLE , CONTENTS , HITCNT , USERID , DATE_FORMAT(WRITETIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS WRITETIME , CATEGORY , CATEGORYSEQUENCE FROM YS_BOARD WHERE BOARDTYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARDSEQUENCE = #{boardSequence} - 1;

SELECT BOARDID , BOARDTYPE , BOARDSEQUENCE , TITLE , CONTENTS , HITCNT , USERID , DATE_FORMAT(WRITETIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS WRITETIME , CATEGORY , CATEGORYSEQUENCE FROM YS_BOARD WHERE BOARDTYPE = #{boardType} AND BOARDSEQUENCE = #{boardSequence} + 1;
